title: DEWENWILS 2 Pack Touch Dimmer Switch, Plug and Play Lamp Touch Control Pad, Touch Lamp Switch, Dimmable LED/CFL Lights, and Incandescent Bulbs, Dimmer Extension Cord, ETL Listed, White

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: Best Sellers Rank:  #35,218 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)    #81 in Dimmer Switches       #81 in Dimmer Switches

shipping_info: FREE Wednesday, June 11 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: [Plug and Play] No need for wiring or programming; just plug your lamp into this plug-in dimmer’s polarized socket and then plug the dimmer into the power outlet; it’s ready to go, helping to extend the life of your bulbs and reduce eye strain

[Easy Touch Control] This lamp dimmer offers simple touchpad [Easy Touch Control] Featuring a touchpad for easy operation, this lamp dimmer starts with the light off; quick tap to turn on, and long press to adjust brightness from dim to bright, you can choose any brightness you need; release and press again to dim the light; another quick tap turns it off; Note: The touchpad must not come into contact with any conductive metal surface

[Time-Saving and Effortless] The 8ft cord allows the touch pad control dimmer light to easily reach your indoor outlets; the metal touchpad with a non-slip base can be placed or mounted anywhere you like, making it convenient to turn on or adjust the light even in the dark

[Bulb Compatibility] Our touch dimmer switch for lamp is designed with the diverse needs of home lighting in mind and is compatible with most dimmable indoor lighting fixtures in your home; it supports dimmable incandescent bulbs 200W and LED bulbs 75W max, with a 120Vac input voltage

[Safe and Reliable] Ideal for bedside lamps, table lamps, floor lamps, and other indoor lights, this light dimmer switch is a time-saving and convenient solution, considerate to the elderly and those with mobility issues

customers_say: Customers find the touch dimmer switch easy to use and appreciate its dimming ability, with one mentioning it has three settings. However, the functionality receives mixed feedback - while some say it works great, others report units that don't work at all. Additionally, customers express concerns about the product's quality.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt is so easy to install!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: This little gadget solved the problem of where to put a lamp on my bedside table.  I upgraded my bedside table, it wasvery unhandy where I wanted to put my lamp. I looked to Amazon for a solution and found Dewenwils' touch dimmer.  Just plug your lamp into the dimmer, plug dimmer into outlet and, problem solved!  I have had no problems with thishandy item.  You can put the on/off "button' anywhere you want,

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt functions as advertised!
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: They arrived quickly, very well pkg’d.  Easy to install and worked just fine !  No issues what so ever. I would buy again as needed!

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 21, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Work perfectly. Bought for a family member and are so useful. Purchased more for parents.

customer_reviews.review_title: 1.0 out of 5 starsOne unit worked for a day, 2nd unit didn't work. I won't buy these again.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: One unit worked for day out of the box. The second unit did not work at all.I've tried many types of dimmers and this is at the bottom of the list. I won't buy these again and suggest you don't either. The only touch switch converters I've found to be reliable are the lamp socket extension ones that screw into your lamp's socket and the light bulb screws into the extension. The lamp will need a metal socket to work. Plastic sockets won't work with the socket extension.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Work as advertised. I noticed that there were some reviews that indicated operational issues. They have a small computer chip, if they do not dim or there seem to be other problems, just unplug them for 5 seconds and reconnect to allow them to reboot.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy on off lamp
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2025
Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: They work great.  Very convenient....ordering more.
